text.textblock: Environmental Impact Statement Related to New Rules and Regulations for Implementing the Reclamation Reform Act of 1982

summary.textblock: The Bureau of Reclamation is amending the notice of intent published in 58 FR 64336, Dec. 6, 1993 to add a scoping meeting in Boise, Idaho.

address.textblock: This additional scoping meeting is scheduled for:
â€¢Boise, Idaho; January 24, 1994, Bureau of Reclamation's Regional Office, room 204, 1150 North Curtis Road, 1 p.m. to 3 p.m.

further.textblock: Mr. Rusty Schuster, Attention: D-5604, Bureau of Reclamation, PO Box 25007, Denver CO 80225. To be placed on a mailing list for any subsequent information, either write Mr. Schuster or telephone (303) 236-1061, extension 237.
